instructions: Check that Wi-Fi and Smartphone Mobile Hotspot are turned off. From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Tap Settings . Under Wireless & networks, tap More . Tap Tethering & portable hotspot . Tap to select the Portable Wi-Fi hotspot check box. Tap Set up Wi-Fi hotspot . Tap the Network SSID field to enter a new network name, if desired. Tap the Security drop-down menu and select the desired options. If prompted, enter a password. Tap Save .
From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Tap Settings . Under Wireless & networks, tap More . Tap Tethering & portable hotspot . Tap to select the Portable Wi-Fi hotspot check box.
